price: 44. Ya sólo (kurani oyo), ezali bokundoli тропа yo mpe bato nayo. Mpe mosika te bokotunama.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذِكۡرٞ لَّكَ وَلِقَوۡمِكَۖ وَسَوۡفَ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu ladhik'run laka waliqawmika wasawfa tus'alūna
